ValidationRule.description: This rule ensures that all Business Evaluation fields are filled before we can update the Opportunity stage to Legal/Procurement.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(contains( $Profile.Name, "Sales"), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Plan__c, "Startup")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Plan__c, "Pro")), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Expansion"),
OR( ISBLANK( What_is_the_Opportunity_Metric__c ), ISBLANK( goals_driving_initiative__c ), ISBLANK( Business_decision__c), ISBLANK( Executive_Buyer__c ), ISBLANK( Champion__c ), AND(ISBLANK(BVA_url__c), Amount >=100000)
), CONTAINS(TEXT(StageName), "Procurement"),
Stage_Number__c > PRIORVALUE(Stage_Number__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please fill all "Business Evaluation" fields before moving Stage to Legal/Procurement.
